amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by the Corps of Engineers to implement or enforce the mitigation methodology referred to as the "Modified Charleston Method".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the Corps of Engineers to implement or enforce the mitigation methodology referred to as the "Modified Charleston Method".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A065) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Scalise.
